titleStmt.title: SII 8.184: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 184. (A.R. No. 588 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE VISHVAKSENA SHRINE IN THE SUNDARARAJA-PERUMAL TEMPLE AT ANBIL, TRICHINOPOLY TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
sva
sti śrī .
kopparakecaripanmaṟku yāṇṭu 5 ñcāvatu muṭaiyāṉ tirayyaṉ paṉaiya ṉuḷḷiṭṭa Ūrom tevark=ku tiruvamutu santi nāṉāḻi ṟuṇi nāṉāḻik=ku Aiñciraṇṭāka Ariciyāl vanta nel Oru nāḷaik=ku mukkuṟuṇi Aṟunāḻi
yāka Ōrāṇṭu 3 100 6 10 nāḷaik=ku vanta nel nūṟṟorupattiru kalaṉey tūṇip patak=ku nañ ceyta nilamāvatu tiruk māvukku kallai kuḷavāykkāluk=ku mek=ku luk=ku vaṭak=kum melpāṟkellai Ūrvāykkāluk=ku kiḻak=kum vaṭapāṟkkellai
tirunantavāṉattuk=kut teṟk=ku yivvicaitta perunānkellaiyuḷ ḷuṭppaṭṭa nilam nānkumāk kāṇik=ku kiḻpāṟkkellai kuḻi munṟumāvuk=ku mek=kum tenpāṟkellai kāṟceyk=ku vaṭak=ku melpā luk=ku kiḻak=kum vaṭapāṟkellai Ukaccan mūnṟumāvuk=kut teṟk=kum miyvvicaitta perunā
kellaiyuḷ Uṭpaṭṭa lam kāle yaraiymāvuk=ku kiḻpāṟkellai Araiye yaraikkālukku mekkum tenpāṟkellai kāṟceyk=ku vaṭak=kum melpāṟkellai nāṉkumākkāṇi ṭuvilvāykkāluk=kut teṟk=kum yivvicaitta perunāṉkellaiyuḷ ḷuṭpaṭṭa nilamum
pāmpuṇikiḻāṉ vayakkal varavai kāṇinilam Oṉpatumāvuk=ku kiḻpāṟkellai palavaravai luk=ku mekkum teṉpāṟkellai peruvaḻik=ku vaṭak=kum melpārkkellai tirumāle āluk=ku kiḻak=kum vaṭapāṟkke kkālluk=kut teṟkum Ivvicaitta perunāṉkellaiyuḷ ḷuṭpaṭṭa nilamum Iraṇṭumāvuk=ku
kellai kāṟceyk=ku mek=kum teṉpāṟkellai munṟumāvuk=ku vaṭak=kum melpāṟkellai mayakkal vāykkāllukku kiḻak=kum vaṭapārkkellai nānkumākkāṇikku teṟkum Ivvicaitta
lukku nicatam nāṭuriyum canti munṟiṉukku Aṭaikkāy Amutu Āṟukku nicatam nānāḻi yuriyum Āka Eṟṟi nel munnāḻi Āka Āṇṭuvaraikku vanta 3 � mukkuṟuṇi nikki ninṟa �� yinā
kkum tenpāṟkkellai vaṭṭamummāvaraikku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai Iraṇṭu māvukku kiḻak=kum vaṭapāṟkellai cevakan Araikkālukku teṟk=kum miyvi
vāy muṉṟumāvukku melpāṟkellai Ūrvāykkāluk=ku kiḻak=kum vaṭapāṟkellai Ūrvāykkālil pirinta vāykkāluk=kut teṟkum kiḻpārkkellai kuḷaṅkarai
Some inscribed stones are missing in the middle and the end of the inscription.
Digital edition of SII 8.184 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
